description: Try our easy to follow Quick Burger & Fries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Beef
name: Quick Burger & Fries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 extra soft jumbo hamburger rolls, split, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230oC. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place chips, in a single layer, on tray. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook burgers for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
In a large bowl, toss coleslaw together with dressing from kit.
Place roll bases on plates. Spoon 1/4 cup coleslaw onto each base. Top with burgers, then sandwich with roll tops. Serve with chips and remaining coleslaw.
